name: foggyline
body:
Branko Ajzele - husband, father of two, son, brother, author, software developer.

Born in January 1983, living in Osijek - Croatia.
Degree in electrical engineering, lover for all things digital, making a living out of software development. Hopes to find enough quality time one day to seriously dive into hobby electronics (eye on Arduino and Raspberry Pi).

Years of hands-on experience with full-time software development and team management, specializing in eCommerce platforms. Working with Magento as of 2008, knee-deep from its very first beta version. Regularly in touch with all things PHP, database (MySQL) and search/analytics (Solr/Elasticsearch) technologies.

Strong technical knowledge with the ability to communicate those technicalities frequently and clearly with strong direction. Feels comfortable proposing alternatives to demands he feels can be improved, even when this means pulling a late shift to meet deadlines.

Branko holds several respected IT certifications such as Zend Certified Engineer (ZCE PHP), Magento Certified Developer (MCD), Magento Certified Developer Plus (MCD+), Magento Certified Solution Specialist (MCSS) and JavaScript Certified Developer.

[Instant E-Commerce with Magento: Build a Shop](https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/instant-e-commerce-magento-build-shop-instant) by Packt Publishing was his first Magento-related book oriented toward Magento newcomers, after which he decided to write [Getting Started with Magento Extension Development](https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/getting-started-magento-extension-development) for developers.

![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/foggyline/images/nhgpyoZF0u1t4j4td.png)
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/foggyline/images/nhgpz2opfo1t4j4td.png)

His third and latest book [Magento 2 Developers Guide](https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/magento-2-developers-guide) covers recent Magento 2 release.

![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/foggyline/images/B05032_MockupCover-1.jpg)

Currently works as a full-time contractor for [Lab Lateral Ltd](http://lab.co.uk/) - an award-winning team of innovative thinkers, artists & developers, specialising in customer-centric websites, digital consultancy & marketing - taking the role of Lead Magento Developer and Head of Labâ€™s Croatia office.

Branko, was crowned Ecommerce Developer of the Year by Digital Entrepreneur Awards in October 2014 for his excellent knowledge and expertise in eCommerce development. His work is second to none, and is truly dedicated to helping the Lab Lateral Ltd team and fellow developers across the world.

![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/foggyline/images/nhgqtgMJDd1t4j4td.jpg)

Connect via [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/brankoajzele) / [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ajzele) / [GitHub](https://github.com/ajzele/).
